Tree-Based Borrowing Detection (trebor)¶

Tree-based detection of borrowings in lexicostatistical wordlists.

Classes¶

class lingpy.compare.trebor.trebor.TreBor(dataset, tree=None, paps='pap', verbose=False, **keywords)¶

Basic class for calculations using the TreBor method.
